channel.title: Softlayer_virtual_host_pcidevice on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_virtual_host_pcidevice on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host_PciDevice
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host_PciDevice Datatype Description This type represents a PCI device on a host. Local id ID of the PCI device. Type: integer uuid The unique id of the PCI device's record on a virtualization platform. Type: string xenPciId The BDF (Domain:Bus:Device.Function) id of the PCI device in XenServer. Type: string Relational hardwareComponentModel Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model
